oai_dc:dc.dc:title: US Army discharge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge of Thomas Kirby served as a blacksmith in Co. A, 5th Tenn. Cav. (USA). Kirby was from Cannon County, Tenn. He was discharged June 25, 1865 at Fayetteville, Lincoln County, Tenn. He was born Sept. 21, 1840. He married Nancy Kirby (born Nov. 10, 1841-Died Jan. 14, 1916). After the war, Mr. Kirby lived in Cannon County. He lost his leg in a horse riding incident. Thomas and Nancy Kirby are buried in Sycamore Cemetery near the Cannon/Dekalb County line.
